message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm afraid I can't go as low as $120. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. How about we try $165?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $155?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'll meet you halfway from my previous offer. How about we try $162.50?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $152?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more concession. How about we try $160?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $155?
